page.title: 02Landscape: Urban Development
page.content: Urban development in the last 50 years has overtaken much of this area. Only narrow belts of{farmland}less than 1Km. wide are left around the village of Daws Heath and on Hadleigh Downs.{Belfairs Park}and just over 100 hectares of{woodland}remain but they are almost surrounded by{housing.} Despite the fact that these remaining open spaces have green belt status, the area north-west of Daws Heath has been under threat of further residential development in recent years. The most recent housing developments are new estates east of West Wood; south of the Great Wood and north-east of Belfairs - together with minor additions to the east end of Daws Heath.
